alert.note: Alert for Colquitt (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 04 at 4:10PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR COOK...SOUTHERN BERRIEN...LANIER...LOWNDES...NORTHERN BROOKS AND EASTERN COLQUITT COUNTIES... At 409 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Sparks, or 8 miles west of Adel, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nashville, Adel, Valdosta, Lakeland, Lake Park, Moultrie, Hahira, Sparks, Ray City, Lenox, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Meigs, Dasher, Morven, Berlin, Cecil, Ellenton and Reed Bingham State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
